text.title: YOUR
text.description: One of the greatest things about the sport of surfing is that you need only three things: your body, a surfboard, and a wave.

videoSection.text: Surfing is the most blissful experience you can have on this planet, a taste of heaven.
videoSection.description: By better understanding the various aspects of surfing, you will improve faster and have more fun in the water.
